text: July Rain () is a 1967 Russian drama movie directed by Marlen Khutsiev and starring Yevgenia Uralova, Aleskandr Belyavsky, Yuri Vizbor, Alexander Mitta, Alla Pokrovskaya. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Marlen Khutsiev
title: July Rain
